Tops for Women

Building your perfect look? Lets take it from the top. For every single outfit, theres a trend-right top to match. From basic tees and tanks to embellished going out styles, Hollisters collection of women's tops cover every for occasion.

Hollister offers so many cute top styles. If you want the perfect basics, start with tees and tanks. Classic styles like the must-have pocket tee and women's short sleeve t-shirts, are those tried-and-true staples you cant get enough of. Available in every color you can imagine, theyre the ultimate stock up basics. Plus, new details like curved hems and colorblocking give them a little extra edge. Women's graphic tees are an awesome way to rock your personal style with artsy details like photo real graphics and positive messages. Our tees layer well with cardigan sweaters or button down shirts and, of course, a killer pair of mom jeans.

From crop tops, bodysuits, camis and tanks weve got every silhouette under the sun. If youre looking to elevate your look, try Hollister shirts and blouses, a versatile approach to top notch dressing. Crop tops are totally on trend while short sleeve t-shirts are forever faves.

Need that next-level layer? Just add a Hollister women's sweater. From cardigans to pullovers, weve got warmer and lighter weight options for those transitional seasons. Pair them with any dress, some women's ripped jeans or even some denim pants and youve got a totally put together look. And if our collection of going out tops doesnt inspire a ladies night out, we dont know what will. Bodysuits, flowy racerback camis and more? You just can't go wrong! Check out our cold-shoulder details or lace up styling.

Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information

Based on your state of residence, you may have the right to direct us not to sell or share (as defined under applicable law) your personal information to third parties for purposes of cross-context targeted advertising. The rights described herein are subject to exemptions and other limitations under applicable law. Please note that not all sharing of information is a "sale" and not all sharing is subject to the right to opt out. To turn off cross-context targeted advertising via cookies and other tracking technologies, toggle Targeting Cookies to off below and click Confirm My Preferences. If the toggle is already set to off, you may have already opted out, or you may have the Global Privacy Control signal enabled in your browser. If you are not logged into your account, your opt out preference will be tracked via a cookie, which means your selection is limited to the specific device and browser you are using during this visit or our website. If you visit this website from a different device or browser, change your browser settings, or if you clear your cookies, you may need to opt out again. You may opt out of email-based "sales" or "sharing" for cross-context targeted advertising by submitting a request using the webform by following the Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Info link in the footer of our website. For more information about additional privacy practices and choices available to you, please visit our Privacy Notice.
